secret_rule: Only items that start with the letter 'F' can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "fruits" and "forks".
Can I bring a picnic blanket?
Player: Can I bring a knife?
Player: Can I bring a spoon?
Player: Can I bring a napkin?
Player: Can I bring a cup?
Player: Can I bring a salad bowl?
Player: Can I bring a bread basket?
The rule appears to be that you can bring items that are used for eating or are edible themselves.
